title: Wintrust Selects Ivory Consulting’s SuperTRUMP
text:
Wintrust Selects Ivory Consulting’s SuperTRUMP August 18, 2015, 07:00 AM Related: Ivory Consulting , Kirk Phillips , Scott Thacker , SuperTRUMP , Wintrust Commercial Finance 
Ivory Consulting Corporation announced that Wintrust Commercial Finance, a division of Wintrust Financial Corporation, selected Ivory’s flagship product, SuperTRUMP, to support its growth as a new provider of highly sophisticated loan and lease products to commercial companies in a variety of industries throughout the United States and Canada. “We are pleased that the leaders of Wintrust, previous users of SuperTRUMP, chose to use SuperTRUMP again,” said Scott Thacker, CEO, Ivory Consulting Corporation. “We are excited to welcome Kirk Phillips and his team back to our family of loyal customers. “Since 1983, Ivory has grown in response to our customers’ needs, and that is evident in the high level of loyalty which we enjoy.”“We have a customer-focused origination philosophy,” said Kirk Phillips, president and CEO of Wintrust Commercial Finance. “SuperTRUMP supports that philosophy by allowing us to analyze and structure financial solutions in an efficient, accurate and timely manner.” Today's Other News
